title: User Interface Extensibility
content:

  • ››Administrator Tools

  • ››User Interface Extensibility

User Interface Extensibility

User Interface (UI) Extensibility enables you to make modifications to Manhattan Active UIs by adding buttons, pop-ups, and additional input fields.

To create a UI Extension, select 'UI Extension' from the left-hand navigation menu. You will then see the different products that are available for you to extend. After selecting the product you would like to make a UI Extension for, a new tab will open in the developer mode, Manhattan ProActive® Designer, for that product. Once in Manhattan ProActive® Designer mode, you may then configure your UI Extension.

Existing Customer UI Extensions

If you would like to modify an already existing extension, there is a manual step you will need to take. An extension pack with an extension pack ID of "LEGACY" should be created through the Manhattan ProActive® UI. Creating an extension pack with this ID will pull in your previously created UI Extensions and make them visible to you in Manhattan ProActive® and in Manhattan ProActive®. If you have previous extensions and do not wish to modify them, no action is necessary.

Utilizing Entity Extensions

To use a custom entity extension created in Manhattan ProActive® within a UI Extension, note that you must create and deploy a separate pack containing the custom entity extension prior to creating the UI Extension. This ensures the custom entity extension you created is also available for use in the UI Extension builder(s), Manhattan ProActive® Designer.
